meta.title: Coronavirus Communications - Nanuet Union Free School District

body.script:
var siteAlerts = [{"id":4054,"title":"The Nanuet School District will be closed and engaged in “at home” learning through Friday, May 15th.","body":"
The Nanuet School District will be closed and engaged in “at home” learning through Friday, May 15th. Also please note that the NYS Board of Regents has canceled June exams.","dateStart":"2020-04-16T20:19:24Z","baseGroupName":"Nanuet Union Free School District","hash":"C+aI0XV7h0dddiJEi5TjtxwaCT0x9Nj3edXnPtl7lXk=","updateDate":"2020-04-16T20:19:18Z"}];

img.alt: Nanuet Union Free School District Home Page
img.div: The Nanuet School District is committed to the personal development of each student so that upon graduation, he or she is prepared and inspired to apply learning in a changing, complex, and interdependent world.

div.p: Get real time district updates on your mobile device with eChalk Notify.
Connect with code G51RTG to get instant alerts or log in with your eChalk user account for the latest updates from all your classes and groups.
